Class MemoryEvent

java.lang.Object
microsim.simulation.event.SimulationEvent
microsim.simulation.event.DebugEvent
microsim.simulation.event.MemoryEvent
public class MemoryEvent extends DebugEvent
SimulationEvent that signals a memory operation on a MemorySpace component.

  • Constructor Details

    • MemoryEvent

      public MemoryEvent(MemorySpace owner, String operationType, char addr, char data)
      Instantiates MemoryEvent getting memory operation information.
      Parameters:
      owner - MemoryDevice that raised MemoryEvent
      operationType - type of operation
      addr - address of operation
      data - data of operation
